Carve Out Corruption.name: Carve Out Corruption
Carve Out Corruption.flavor: You strike to the malignant core of your sworn enemy, momentarily stopping its corrupting influence.
Carve Out Corruption.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls on attacks that target Will until the end of your next turn.

Judgment of the True King.name: Judgment of the True King
Judgment of the True King.flavor: You advance in concert with your allies, taking strength from their bravery and beseeching the freed spirit of King Pedrawd to imbue your weapon with its divine wrath.
Judgment of the True King.effect: Before the attack, you and each ally within 5 squares of you can shift 3 squares as a free action.
Judgment of the True King.onHit: 4[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, or 6[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage if at least two of your allies are adjacent to the target.

Sanctity of the Ring.name: Sanctity of the Ring
Sanctity of the Ring.flavor: A radiant halo encircles you and nearby allies, blessing them with your divine unity.
Sanctity of the Ring.effect: You enter the sanctity of the ring stance. Until the stance ends, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to saving throws while adjacent to your oath of enmity target. If you and at least 2 other allies are adjacent to your oath of enmity target, the bonus increases to +4.
